title: Japan
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,505 words, Level Z (Grade 5), Lexile 1080L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     K and T
description: Japan is an exciting, vibrant country. From the volcanic landscape to the bustling cities, students will enjoy reading about this fascinating country. Colorful pictures and maps support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
